user_query: I'm writing an article about famous cities. Could you give me the details and population of the largest cities within a 50-kilometer range of New York City? Also, find the nearest cities to London and provide their population and geographical coordinates.

TaskList.description: Get a list of the largest cities within a 50-kilometer radius of New York City.
Retrieve population and details of the cities obtained in Step 1.
Find the nearest cities to London within a specified radius.
Get the population and geographical coordinates of the cities obtained in Step 3.
